messages.subject: book value question
messages.msgSnippet: ye all, while packing for the chicago show,I come across this old sword book set I have. Title is  Nihonto Taikan  by Honami Koson , publishing date is Showa
messages.messageBody:
ye all,
while packing for the chicago show,I come across this old sword book
set I have. Title is " Nihonto Taikan " by Honami Koson , publishing
date is Showa 17th year ( 1942 ? ).
2 voulume set.
Any idea as to rarity and fair retail value ?

milt
